text.content:
Characters

The focus of your game is on the player characters (PCs) â€” adventurers with class levels.

Generate new PCs with the standard Shadowdark RPG character creation rules.

Fortune's Favor. New PCs begin with a luck token.

You'll typically want your group to have 2-4 PCs. If you have more than four, it can be hard to track.

If you want to have only one PC in your group, consider starting at a higher level.

Jump In!

You can head into a pre-written dungeon and use the Oracle to help decide your characters'choices. Or you can create an entirely new adventure from scratch (get ideas on pg. 7)!

See pg. 3-4 for gameplay examples and further resources.
